thread.title: Small room friendly hotel
thread.title_full: Small room friendly hotel - Review of Hotel Basss by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

title: Small room friendly hotel
text:
Stayed at Hotel basss March 11-14.Just below Sacre Coeur and in a nice neighbourhood Monmatre.Staff were great,room comfortable,bathroom er.Small shall we say.Plenty of good restaurants nearby especially Restaurant Caretello on Rue de Aruan just around the corner.Sights easily reached by bus 5min walk on main road.We definitely will be going back.Just fir a changecwe went by eurostar again will do that again!!!
Room Tip: Ask for one with a hairdryer!!! See more room tips
